book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲛⲉ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲇⲉ ⲕⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁ. ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥⲕⲁ ⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ
English: But the Lord will never leave off his mercy, neither shall any of his works perish,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϥϥⲱⲧⲉ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲥⲱⲧⲡ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϥⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲙⲉⲣⲓⲧϥ̅.
English: neither will he abolish the posterity of his elect, and the seed of him that loveth him he will not take away:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϯ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲱϫⲡ̅ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲁⲕⲱⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲟⲩⲛⲟⲩⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲇⲁⲩⲉⲓⲇ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅.
English: wherefore he gave a remnant unto Jacob, and out of him a root unto David.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ........... ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥⲉⲓⲟⲧⲉ ⲁϥⲕⲱ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲡⲉⲣⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲁⲑⲏⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲉϥϣⲁⲁⲧ ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ϩⲣⲟⲃⲟⲁⲙ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲡⲉϣ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϣⲟϫⲛⲉ.
English: Thus rested Solomon with his fathers, and of his seed he left behind him Roboam, even the foolishness of the people, and one that had no understanding, who turned away the people through his counsel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲓⲉⲣⲟⲃⲟⲁⲙ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲃⲁⲧ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲣⲉ ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲁϥϯ ⲧⲉϩⲓⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲉⲫⲣⲁⲓⲙ.
English: There was also Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who caused Israel to sin, and shewed Ephraim the way of sin:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ⲛⲉⲩⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲉⲡⲟⲟⲛⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲩⲕⲁϩ.
English: And their sins were multiplied exceedingly, that they were driven out of the land.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲓⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ϣⲁⲛⲧⲉ ⲡϫⲓⲕⲃⲁ ⲉⲓ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ.
English: For they sought out all wickedness, till the vengeance came upon them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲱⲟⲩⲛ ⲛ̅ϭⲓ ϩⲏⲗⲓⲁⲥ ⲡⲉⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉϥϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙⲟⲩϩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲗⲁⲙⲡⲁⲥ:
English: Then stood up Elias the prophet as fire, and his word burned like a lamp.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲫⲉⲃⲱⲱⲛ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲥ̅ⲃⲕⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲕⲱϩ.
English: He brought a sore famine upon them, and by his zeal he diminished their number.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲉϣⲧ̅ ⲧⲡⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁϥⲛ̅ ⲡⲕⲱϩⲧ ⲉϫⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϣⲙ̅ⲧ ⲥⲟⲡ.
English: By the word of the Lord he shut up the heaven, and also three times brought down fire.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲉⲛⲧⲁⲕϫⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲏⲗⲓⲁⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉϯⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲕ ⲉⲧⲣⲉϥϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ;
English: O Elias, how wast thou honoured in thy wondrous deeds! and who may glory like unto thee!

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲟⲩⲛⲉⲥ ⲟⲩⲕⲱⲱⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡϣⲁϫⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ:
English: Who didst raise up a dead man from death, and his soul from the place of the dead, by the word of the most High:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁϥⲧⲁⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲉⲣⲱⲟⲩ ..... ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧϩⲁ ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲩϭⲗⲟϭ:
English: Who broughtest kings to destruction, and honourably men from their bed:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲡⲉϫⲡⲓⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲥⲉⲓⲛⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉϩⲁⲡ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲃⲁ ⲛ̅ⲭⲱⲣⲏⲃ:
English: Who heardest the rebuke of the Lord in Sinai, and in Horeb the judgment of vengeance:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧⲧⲁϩⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲓⲉⲣⲟ ⲉⲩⲧⲱⲱⲃⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲓⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ ⲉⲣ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲙⲁ ⲙⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲥⲱϥ:
English: Who anointedst kings to take revenge, and prophets to succeed after him:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲛⲁⲩⲁⲛⲁⲗⲁⲙⲃⲁⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲉⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲁⲣⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲟ ⲛ̅ⲕⲱϩⲧ̅:
English: Who was taken up in a whirlwind of fire, and in a chariot of fiery horses:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲥϩⲁⲉⲓϥ ⲛ̅ϫⲡⲓⲟ ⲉⲛⲉⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲉⲧⲁⲗϭⲟ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟⲣⲅⲏ ϩⲁⲑⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅
English: Who wast ordained for reproofs in their times, to pacify the wrath of the Lord’s judgment, before it brake forth into fury,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲕⲧⲉ ⲫⲏⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲉⲡⲉϥϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲥⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲫⲩⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲁⲕⲱⲃ.
English: and to turn the heart of the father unto the son, and to restore the tribes of Jacob.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲉⲓⲁⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲧⲕ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲉ: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁⲛⲟⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲧⲛ̅ⲛⲁⲱⲛϩ̅.
English: Blessed are they that saw thee, and slept in love; for we shall surely live.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲏⲗⲓⲁⲥ ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁⲩⲥⲕⲉⲡⲁⲍⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲁⲧⲏⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲉⲗⲓⲥⲥⲁⲓⲟⲥ ⲙⲟⲩϩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲡⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁ.
English: Elias it was, who was covered with a whirlwind: and Eliseus was filled with his spirit:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲁⲣⲭⲱⲛ ⲕⲓⲙ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ϫⲓⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ϫⲛⲁϩ.
English: whilst he lived, he was not moved with the presence of any prince, neither could any bring him into subjection.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁϫⲉ ϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲥⲱⲙⲁ ⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲉⲩⲉ ⲉϥⲙⲟⲟⲩⲧ.
English: No word could overcome him; and after his death his body prophesied.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲁϥⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ϩⲛ̅ϣⲡⲏⲣⲉ ⲛⲉ ⲛⲉϥϩⲃⲏⲩⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲕⲉⲙⲟⲩ.
English: He did wonders in his life, and at his death were his works marvellous.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲙⲉⲧⲁⲛⲟⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲥⲁϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩⲛⲟⲃⲉ ϣⲁⲛⲧⲟⲩⲡⲟⲟⲛⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲟⲟⲣⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲧⲏⲣϥ̅.
English: For all this the people repented not, neither departed they from their sins, till they were spoiled and carried out of their land, and were scattered through all the earth:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϭⲱ ⲉϥⲥⲟⲃⲕ̅ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ ⲁⲣⲭⲱⲛ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲏⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲇⲁⲩⲉⲓⲇ.
English: yet there remained a small people, and a ruler in the house of David:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲟⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲙⲉⲛ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱϣ ϩⲉⲛⲕⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲇⲉ ⲁⲩⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲛⲟⲃⲉ.
English: Of whom some did that which was pleasing to God, and some multiplied sins.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲉⲍⲉⲕⲓⲁⲥ ϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲁϥϫⲓ ⲱⲅ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ⲉⲧⲉⲩⲙⲏⲧⲉ.
English: Ezekias fortified his city, and brought in water into the midst thereof:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϣⲉⲕⲧ ⲟⲩⲡⲉⲧⲣⲁ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲉⲛⲓⲡⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲕⲱⲧ ⲛ̅ⲕⲣⲏⲛⲏ ⲉϯⲙⲟⲟⲩ.
English: he digged the hard rock with iron, and made wells for waters.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲥⲉⲛⲛⲁⲭⲏⲣⲉⲓⲙ ⲉⲓ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁϥϫⲉⲩ ϩⲣⲁⲯⲁⲕⲏⲥ ⲁϥⲃⲱⲕ ⲁϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉϥϭⲓϫ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲥⲉⲓⲱⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϫⲓ ⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲣⲟⲩⲟ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲉϥⲙⲛ̅ⲧϫⲁⲥⲓ ϩⲏⲧ.
English: In his time Sennacherib came up, and sent Rabsaces, and lifted up his hand against Sion, and boasted proudly.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲟⲧⲉ ⲁ ⲛⲉⲩϩⲏⲧ ⲕⲓⲙ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϭⲓϫ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϯ ⲛⲁⲁⲕⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲧⲛⲁⲙⲓⲥⲉ.
English: Then trembled their hearts and hands, and they were in pain, as women in travail.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱϣ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲓⲥ ⲡⲛⲁⲏⲧ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲡⲱⲣϣ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲩϭⲓϫ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲉⲡⲏ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲡⲉ ⲁϥⲥⲱⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧϭⲓϫ ⲛ̅ⲏⲥⲁⲓ̈ⲁⲥ.
English: But they called upon the Lord which is merciful, and stretched out their hands toward him: and immediately the Holy One heard them out of heaven, and delivered them by the ministry of Esay.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲡⲁⲧⲁⲥⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲁⲣⲉⲙⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲥⲥⲩⲣⲓⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲁⲅⲅⲉⲗⲟⲥ ⲟⲩⲟϣϥⲟⲩ.
English: He smote the host of the Assyrians, and his angel destroyed them.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲉⲍⲉⲕⲓⲁⲥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲣ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲱϣ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϭⲙ̅ϭⲟⲙ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲇⲁⲩⲉⲓⲇ ⲡⲉϥⲉⲓⲱⲧ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲉⲧⲉ ⲁ ⲏⲥⲁⲓ̈ⲁⲥ ⲡⲉⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ ϩⲟⲛⲟⲩ ⲉⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲡⲛⲟϭ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲧⲛ̅ϩⲟⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲣⲁⲥⲓⲥ.
English: For Ezekias had done the thing that pleased the Lord, and was strong in the ways of David his father, as Esay the prophet, who was great and faithful in his vision, had commanded him.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲡⲣⲏ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲉ ⲉⲡⲁϩⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁϥⲟⲩⲉϩ ⲟⲩⲁϩⲉ ⲉⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲟ.
English: In his time the sun went backward, and he lengthened the king’s life.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲉⲩⲙⲁ ⲁϥⲛⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲁⲉⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲡⲁⲣⲁⲕⲁⲗⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲏⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲓⲱⲛ.
English: He saw by an excellent spirit what should come to pass at the last, and he comforted them that mourned in Sion.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲧⲁⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲛⲉⲧⲛⲁϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲧϩⲏⲡ ⲉⲙⲡⲁⲧⲟⲩϣⲱⲡⲉ.
English: He shewed what should come to pass for ever, and secret things or ever they came.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲱⲥⲉⲓⲁⲥ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲉⲩⲥⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲩϩⲏⲛⲉ ⲉϥⲧⲥⲁⲛⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲡⲉⲥⲥⲟϭⲛ̅:
English: The remembrance of Josias is like the composition of the perfume that is made by the art of the apothecary:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϥⲛⲁϩⲗⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲃⲓⲱ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲧⲁⲡⲣⲟ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲛ̅ⲙⲟⲩⲥⲓⲕⲟⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲥⲩⲙⲡⲟⲥⲓⲟⲛ ⲛ̅ⲏⲣⲡ̅.
English: it is sweet as honey in all mouths, and as musick at a banquet of wine.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲁϥⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲧⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϥⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲃⲟⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲛⲟⲙⲓⲁ.
English: He behaved himself uprightly in the conversion of the people, and took away the abominations of iniquity.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁϥⲧⲁϫⲣⲉ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲁⲉⲓ ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ⲁⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ
English: He directed his heart unto the Lord, and in the time of the ungodly he established the worship of God.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲇⲁⲩⲉⲓⲇ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲉⲍⲉⲕⲓⲁⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲓ̈ⲱⲥⲉⲓⲁⲥ ⲁⲩⲣ̅ⲛⲟⲃⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲟⲃⲉ: ⲁⲩⲕⲱ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ⲥⲱⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲟⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: All, except David and Ezekias and Josias, were defective: for they forsook the law of the most High, even the kings of Juda failed.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲛⲉⲣⲱⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲟⲩⲇⲁⲥ ⲱϫⲛ̅: ⲁⲩϯ ⲡⲉⲩⲧⲁⲡ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛⲕⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ϣⲙ̅ⲙⲟ.
English: Therefore he gave their power unto others, and their glory to a strange nation.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲣⲱⲕϩ̅ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲱⲧⲡ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲟⲩⲟⲡ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲣ̅ ⲛⲉⲥϩⲓⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲉⲓⲉ.
English: They burnt the chosen city of the sanctuary, and made the streets desolate,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲉⲣⲏⲙⲓⲁⲥ ⲁⲩⲑⲙ̅ⲕⲟϥ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲧⲃ̅ⲃⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲉ ⲉⲡⲱⲣⲕ̅ ⲉⲑⲙ̅ⲕⲟ; ⲉⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲕⲱⲧ ⲉⲧⲱϭⲉ.
English: according to the prophecy of Jeremias. (7) For they entreated him evil, who nevertheless was a prophet, sanctified in his mother’s womb, that he might root out, and afflict, and destroy; and that he might build up also, and plant.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲍⲉⲕⲓⲏⲗ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥⲛⲁⲩ ⲉⲑⲟⲣⲁⲥⲓⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲧⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲟⲩⲟⲥ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ϩⲓϫⲙ̅ ⲫⲁⲣⲙⲁ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲭⲉⲣⲟⲩⲃⲉⲓⲛ.
English: It was Ezekiel who saw the glorious vision, which was shewed him upon the chariot of the cherubims.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲁϥⲣ̅ ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϩⲱⲟⲩ ⲉⲣ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲛⲟⲩϥ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲥⲟⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϩⲓⲟⲩⲉ.
English: For he made mention of the enemies under the figure of the rain, and directed them that went right.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲕⲉⲉⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲛⲟⲟⲩⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲟⲫⲏⲧⲏⲥ ϯⲟⲩⲱ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲩⲙⲁ.
English: And of the twelve prophets let the memorial be blessed, and let their bones flourish again out of their place:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲡⲁⲣⲁⲕⲁⲗⲓ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲁⲕⲱⲃ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲥⲟⲧⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲡⲓⲥⲧⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲗⲡⲓⲥ.
English: for they comforted Jacob, and delivered them by assured hope.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲛⲛⲁϫⲉⲥⲧ̅ ⲍⲟⲣⲟⲃⲁⲃⲉⲗ ⲛ̅ⲁϣ ⲛ̅ϩⲉ; ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲫⲣⲁⲅⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϭⲓϫ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲛⲁⲙ
English: How shall we magnify Zorobabel? even he was as a signet on the right hand:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲓ̈ⲏⲥⲟⲩⲥ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲱⲥⲉⲇⲉⲕ; ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲕⲉⲧ ⲡⲏⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲧⲥⲃ̅ⲧⲱⲧ ⲉⲩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ.
English: So was Jesus the son of Josedec: who in their time builded the house, and set up an holy temple to the Lord, which was prepared for everlasting glory.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲧⲓ ⲉⲧⲛ̅ϯ ⲉⲙⲁⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲛⲧⲁϥⲧⲟⲩⲛⲉⲥ ⲛⲉⲛⲥⲟⲃⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲁϩⲟ ⲉⲣⲁⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲡⲩⲗⲏ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲭⲗⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲁϥⲧⲟⲩⲛⲉⲥ ⲛⲉⲛⲏⲉⲓ.
English: And among the elect was Neemias, whose renown is great, who raised up for us the walls that were fallen, and set up the gates and the bars, and raised up our ruins again.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩⲥⲛ̅ⲧ ⲗⲁⲁⲩ ϩⲓϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲉⲛⲱⲭ: ⲕⲁⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲁⲛⲁⲗⲁⲙⲃⲁⲛⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟϥ ϩⲓϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ.
English: But upon the earth was no man created like Enoch; for he was taken from the earth.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲩϫⲡⲉ ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲉϥⲉⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲱⲥⲏⲫ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟϭ ⲉⲛⲉϥⲥⲛⲏⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϫⲣⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϭⲙ̅ⲡϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥⲕⲉⲉⲥ.
English: Neither was there a young man born like Joseph, a governor of his brethren, a stay of the people, whose bones were regarded of the Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲏⲙ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲥⲏⲑ ⲁⲩϫⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲇⲁⲙ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲉ ⲣⲱⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲥⲱⲛⲧ̅.
English: Sem and Seth were in great honour among men, and so was Adam above every living thing in creation.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲥⲓⲙⲱⲛ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲉⲭⲟⲛⲓⲁⲥ ⲡⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲏⲏⲃ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥϫⲓϫⲁⲥϥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲏⲓ̈ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲧⲁϫⲣⲉ ⲡⲉⲣⲡⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ
English: Simon the high priest, the son of Onias, who in his life repaired the house again, and in his days fortified the temple:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲥⲙ̅ⲛ ⲥⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲇⲓⲡⲗⲏ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲓⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲧⲡⲉ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲣⲡⲉ.
English: And by him was built from the foundation the double height, the high fortress of the wall about the temple:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲁ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟⲟⲩϩⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲱϫⲛ̅: ⲁϥⲧⲁϣⲉ ⲡϣⲓ ⲙ̅ⲫⲟⲙⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲑⲁⲗⲁⲥⲥⲁ.
English: In his days the cistern to receive water, being in compass as the sea, was covered with plates of brass:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϥⲓⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲟⲟⲩϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϫⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϩⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥϯϭⲟⲙ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲟⲗⲓⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲥ.
English: He took care of the temple that it should not fall, and fortified the city against besieging:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥϫⲓⲉⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲧⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲓ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲏⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲁⲧⲁⲡⲉⲧⲁⲥⲙⲁ.
English: How was he honoured in the midst of the people in his coming out of the sanctuary!

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲓⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϩⲧⲟⲟⲩⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲟϩ ⲉⲧⲙⲉϩ ⲛ̅.... ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ:
English: He was as the morning star in the midst of a cloud, and as the moon at the full:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲣⲏ ⲉⲧⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ⲉϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲣⲡⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲡⲓⲧⲉ ⲉⲧⲣ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ
English: As the sun shining upon the temple of the most High, and as the rainbow giving light in the bright clouds:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ϩⲉⲛϩⲣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣⲧ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲃⲣ̅ⲣⲉ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲣⲓⲛⲟⲛ ⲉϥϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲙⲟⲟⲩ ⲉϥϩⲁⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϯⲟⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲗⲓⲃⲁⲛⲟⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϣⲱⲙ:
English: And as the flower of roses in the spring of the year, as lilies by the rivers of waters, and as the branches of the frankincense tree in the time of summer:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩⲧ̅ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲗⲓⲃⲁⲛⲟⲥ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲟⲩⲣⲏ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲛⲁⲁⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲟⲩⲃ ⲛ̅ϫⲁϩϫ̅ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲉⲓⲉⲡ ⲉⲛⲉⲙⲙⲉ ⲛⲓⲙ:
English: As fire and incense in the censer, and as a vessel of beaten gold set with all manner of precious stones:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ϫⲟⲉⲓⲧ ⲉⲥⲧⲁⲩⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲥⲕⲁⲣⲡⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲩⲡⲁⲣⲓⲥⲥⲟⲥ ⲉⲥϫⲟⲥⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲕⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ.
English: And as a fair olive tree budding forth fruit, and as a cypress tree which groweth up to the clouds.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥϫⲓ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲧⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛϥ̅ϯ ϩⲓⲱⲱϥ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥⲩⲛⲧⲉⲗⲉⲓⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥⲁⲗⲉ ⲉϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁⲥⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲁⲁⲃ ⲁϥϯⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲣϣⲱⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲩⲟⲡ.
English: When he put on the robe of honour, and was clothed with the perfection of glory, when he went up to the holy altar, he made the garment of holiness honourable.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲣⲉϥϫⲓ ⲇⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲉⲃⲓⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϭⲓϫ ⲉⲧⲛⲉⲥⲱⲟⲩ (ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲟϥ ⲉϥⲁϩⲉ ⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ϩⲁⲧⲛ̅ ⲧⲉⲥⲭⲁⲣⲁ ⲛ̅ⲧϣⲟⲩⲣⲏ) ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲗⲟⲙ ⲉϥⲙ̅ⲡⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲥⲛⲏⲩ ⲉϥⲟ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϯⲟⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲕⲉⲛⲇⲣⲟⲥ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲗⲓⲃⲁⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲛ̅ⲑⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲓⲕⲁϥ ⲛ̅ⲃⲛ̅ⲛⲉ
English: When he took the portions out of the priests’ hands, he himself stood by the hearth of the altar, compassed about, as a young cedar in Libanus; and as palm trees compassed they him round about.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲁⲁⲣⲱⲛ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲩⲉⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲉ ⲧⲉⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩϭⲓϫ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲕⲕⲗⲏⲥⲓⲁ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ
English: So were all the sons of Aaron in their glory, and the oblations of the Lord in their hands, before all the congregation of Israel.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲣ̅ⲣⲉϥϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ ϩⲓϫⲛ̅ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲟⲩⲉ ⲉⲕⲟⲥⲙⲓ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲡⲣⲟⲥⲫⲟⲣⲁ ⲙ̅ⲡⲡⲁⲛⲧⲟⲕⲣⲁⲧⲱⲣ ⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: And finishing the service at the altar, that he might adorn the offering of the most high Almighty,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲥⲟⲩⲧⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲟⲧϥ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲉⲡⲉⲛⲕⲁ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲱⲧⲛ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁϥⲟⲩⲱⲧⲛ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲛⲟϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲗⲟⲟⲗⲉ:
English: He stretched out his hand to the cup, and poured of the blood of the grape,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥⲡⲱϩⲧ̅ ϩⲁⲣⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲑⲩⲥⲓⲁⲥⲧⲏⲣⲓⲟⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲥϯⲛⲟⲩϥⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲡⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ⲙ̅ⲡⲧⲏⲣϥ̅.
English: he poured out at the foot of the altar a sweetsmelling savour unto the most high King of all.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲟⲧⲉ ⲁ ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲁⲁⲣⲱⲛ ϫⲓϣⲕⲁⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲙⲟⲩⲧⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ϩⲉⲛⲥⲁⲗⲡⲓⲅⲝ ⲛ̅ϫⲁϩϫϩ̅:
English: Then shouted the sons of Aaron, and sounded the silver trumpets,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲧⲣⲉⲩⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲩⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲥⲙⲏ ⲉⲩⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: and made a great noise to be heard, for a remembrance before the most High.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲟⲧⲉ ⲁ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲧⲏⲣϥ̅ ϭⲉⲡⲏ ϩⲓ ⲟⲩⲥⲟⲡ ⲁⲩⲡⲁϩⲧⲟⲩ ⲉϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲩϩⲟ ⲉϫⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲉⲩⲟⲩⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲡⲁⲛⲧⲟⲕⲣⲁⲧⲱⲣ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: Then all the people together hasted, and fell down to the earth upon their faces to worship their Lord God Almighty, the most High.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲛ̅ⲣⲉϥⲯⲁⲗⲗⲉⲓ ⲥⲙⲟⲩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲥⲙⲏ ⲁ ⲟⲩⲗ̅ⲗⲉ ⲥⲱⲕ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲛⲟϭ ⲛ̅ⲏⲉⲓ.
English: The singers also sang praises with their voices, with great variety of sounds was there made sweet melody.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲥⲉⲡⲥ̅ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉⲩϣⲗⲏⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲛⲁⲏⲧ ϣⲁⲛⲧⲉ ⲡⲕⲟⲥⲙⲟⲥ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲩϫⲱⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉϥϣⲙ̅ϣⲉ.
English: And the people besought the Lord, the most High, by prayer before him that is merciful, till the solemnity of the Lord was ended, and they had finished his service.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲟⲧⲉ ⲁϥⲉⲓ ⲉⲡⲉⲥⲏⲧ ⲁϥϥⲓ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉϥϭⲓϫ ⲉϩⲣⲁⲓ̈ ⲉϫⲛ̅ ⲧⲥⲟⲟⲩϩⲥ̅ ⲧⲏⲣⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ⲉϯ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲩⲥⲡⲟⲧⲟⲩ
English: Then he went down, and lifted up his hands over the whole congregation of the children of Israel, to give the blessing of the Lord with his lips, and to rejoice in his name.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉϣⲟⲩϣⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥⲣⲁⲛ ⲉϫⲓ ⲡⲉⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ.
English: And they bowed themselves down to worship the second time, that they might receive a blessing from the most High.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲉⲛⲟⲩ ϭⲉ ⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲛ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲡⲉϯⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲙ̅ⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲛⲟϭ ϩⲙ̅ ⲙⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ
English: Now therefore bless ye the God of all, which only doeth wondrous things every where,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲡⲉⲧϫⲟⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲛϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲟⲟⲧⲉ ⲡⲉⲧⲉⲓⲣⲉ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲛ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁ.
English: which exalteth our days from the womb, and dealeth with us according to his mercy.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥⲉϯ ⲛⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲛⲟϥ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲉⲓⲣⲏⲛⲏ ϣⲱⲡⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲛϩⲟⲟⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲓⲥⲣⲁⲏⲗ ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϣⲁ ⲉⲛⲉϩ
English: He grant us joyfulness of heart, and that peace may be in our days in Israel for ever:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲁⲛϩⲉⲧ ⲡⲉϥⲛⲁ ⲛⲙ̅ⲙⲁⲛ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲥⲟⲧⲛ̅ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϥϩⲟⲟⲩ.
English: That he would confirm his mercy with us, and deliver us at his time!

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲧⲁⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲙⲉⲥⲧⲉ ϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲥⲛⲁⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲙⲉϩϣⲟⲙⲛ̅ⲧ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϩⲉⲑⲛⲟⲥ ⲁⲛ ⲡⲉ: ⲛⲉⲫⲩⲗⲓⲥⲧⲉⲓⲙ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲏϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲥⲁⲙⲁⲣⲓⲁ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲗⲁⲟⲥ ⲛ̅ⲥⲟϭ ⲉⲧⲟⲩⲏϩ ϩⲛ̅ ⲥⲓϭⲓⲙⲁ.
English: There be two manner of nations which my heart abhorreth, and the third is no nation: (26) They that sit upon the mountain of Samaria, and they that dwell among the Philistines, and that foolish people that dwell in Sichem.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲧⲉⲥⲃⲱ ⲛ̅ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲣⲙ̅ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲁⲃⲉ ⲁⲓ̈ⲥϩⲁⲓ̈ⲥⲟⲩ ϩⲓ ⲡⲉⲓ̈ϫⲱⲱⲙⲉ ⲓ̈ⲏⲥⲟⲩⲥ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲓⲣⲁⲭ ⲉⲗⲉⲁⲍⲁⲣ ⲡϩⲓⲉⲣⲟⲥⲟⲗⲩⲙⲉⲓⲧⲏⲥ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁϥⲃⲉⲉⲃⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ.
English: Jesus the son of Sirach of Jerusalem hath written in this book the instruction of understanding and knowledge, who out of his heart poured forth wisdom.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲛⲁⲉⲓⲁⲧϥ̅ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲙⲟⲟϣⲉ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲧⲛⲁⲕⲁⲁⲩ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲉϥϩⲏⲧ ⲛⲁⲣ̅ⲥⲁⲃⲉ.
English: Blessed is he that shall be exercised in these things; and he that layeth them up in his heart shall become wise.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉϥϣⲁⲛ ⲣ̅ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲅⲁⲣ ϥⲛⲁϭⲙ̅ϭⲟⲙ ⲉⲣⲟⲟⲩ ⲧⲏⲣⲟⲩ ϫⲉ ⲡⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓⲛ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲉ ⲡⲉϥⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ. ⲡⲉϣⲗⲏⲗ ⲛ̅ⲓ̈ⲏⲥⲟⲩⲥ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲉⲓⲣⲁⲭ.
English: For if he do them, he shall be strong to all things: for the light of the Lord leadeth him, who giveth wisdom to the godly. Blessed be the name of the Lord for ever. Amen, Amen.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϯⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲁⲣ̅ⲣⲟ ϯⲛⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲡⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ ⲡⲁⲥⲱⲧⲏⲣ ϯⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ:
English: I will thank thee, O Lord and King, and praise thee, O God my Saviour: I do give praise unto thy name:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ϫⲉ ⲁⲕϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲃⲟⲏⲑⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛ̅ⲥⲕⲉⲡⲁⲥⲧⲏⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲕⲥⲱⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲥⲱⲙⲁ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲩϭⲟⲣϭⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲇⲓⲁⲃⲟⲗⲏ ⲛ̅ⲗⲁⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲛⲉⲥⲡⲟⲧⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲣ̅ϩⲱⲃ ⲉⲡϭⲟⲗ:
English: For thou art my defender and helper, and has preserved my body from destruction, and from the snare of the slanderous tongue, and from the lips that forge lies,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲙ̅ⲧⲟ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧⲁϩⲉ ⲟⲩⲃⲏⲓ̈ ⲁⲕϣⲱⲡⲉ ⲛⲁⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲃⲟⲏⲑⲟⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲕⲥⲟⲧ.
English: and has been mine helper against mine adversaries: (3) And hast delivered me,

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲕⲁⲧⲁ ⲡⲁϣⲁⲓ̈ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲛⲁ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ ⲁⲕⲛⲁϩⲙⲉⲧ ⲉⲣⲱϥ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲧⲥⲃ̅ⲧⲱⲧ ⲉⲩⲟⲙⲧ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϭⲓϫ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲧⲁⲯⲩⲭⲏ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲙⲏⲏϣⲉ ⲛ̅ⲑⲗⲓⲯⲓⲥ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲩⲧⲁϩⲟⲓ̈
English: according to the multitude of they mercies and greatness of thy name, from the teeth of them that were ready to devour me, and out of the hands of such as sought after my life, and from the manifold afflictions which I had;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲡϭⲱⲛⲧ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩϣⲁϩ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲉⲙⲡⲟⲩⲣⲟⲕϩⲧ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲛ̅ ⲧⲙⲏⲧⲉ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲕⲱϩⲧ̅
English: From the choking of fire on every side, and from the midst of the fire which I kindled not;

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲡϣⲓⲕ ⲛ̅ϩⲏⲧϥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲉⲩⲗⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ⲁⲕⲁⲑⲁⲣⲧⲟⲥ ⲙⲛ̅ ⲟⲩϣⲁϫⲉ ⲛ̅ϭⲟⲗ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲉⲩϩⲓⲗⲁ ⲛ̅ⲗⲁⲥ ⲛ̅ϫⲓⲛ̅ϭⲟⲛⲥ̅ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲣ̅ⲣⲟ.
English: From the depth of the belly of hell, from an unclean tongue, and from lying words.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁ ⲧⲁⲯⲩⲭⲏ ϩⲱⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ϣⲁ ⲡⲙⲟⲩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲣⲉ ⲡⲁⲱⲛϩ̅ ϩⲏⲛ ⲉϩⲟⲩⲛ ..ⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲥⲏⲧ.
English: By an accusation to the king from an unrighteous tongue my soul drew near even unto death, my life was near to the hell beneath.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲩⲁⲙⲁϩⲧⲉ ⲙ̅ⲙⲟⲓ̈ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲥⲁ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲛⲉⲙⲛ̅ ⲡⲉⲧⲃⲟⲏⲑⲉⲓ ⲉⲣⲟⲓ̈ ⲉⲉⲓϭⲱϣⲧ̅ ⲉⲧⲣⲉ ⲟⲩⲣⲱⲙⲉ ϣⲟⲡⲧ̅ ⲉⲣⲟϥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲙ̅ⲡⲓϭⲛ̅ⲧϥ̅.
English: They compassed me on every side, and there was no man to help me: I looked for the succour of men, but there was none.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲓ̈ⲣ̅ⲡⲙⲉⲉⲩⲉ ⲙ̅ⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲡⲉⲕϩⲱⲃ ϫⲓⲛ ⲉⲛⲉϩ ϫⲉ ⲁⲕⲛⲟⲩϩⲙ̅ ⲛ̅ⲛⲉⲧϩⲩⲡⲟⲙⲓⲛⲉ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ϣⲁⲕⲧⲟⲩϫⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ϭⲓϫ ⲛ̅ⲛ̅ϫⲁϫⲉ.
English: Then thought I upon thy mercy, O Lord, and upon thy acts of old, how thou deliverest such as wait for thee, and savest them out of the hands of the enemies.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁϥϫⲓⲥⲉ ⲛ̅ⲧⲁⲙⲛ̅ⲧϩⲙ̅ϩⲁⲗ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲕⲁϩ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲓ̈ⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅ ⲉⲛⲁϩⲙⲉⲧ ⲉⲡⲙⲟⲩ.
English: Then lifted I up my supplications from the earth, and prayed for deliverance from death.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach

Sahidic: ⲁⲓ̈ⲉⲡⲓⲕⲁⲗⲉⲓ ⲙ̅ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲡⲓⲱⲧ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ ⲉⲧⲙ̅ⲕⲁⲁⲧ ϩⲛ̅ ⲛⲉϩⲟⲟⲩ ⲛ̅ⲧⲉⲑⲗⲓⲯⲓⲥ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛ̅ϫⲁⲥⲓϩⲏⲧ ⲉⲙⲛ̅ⲃⲟⲏⲑⲓⲁ.
English: I called upon the Lord, the Father of my Lord, that he would not leave me in the days of my trouble, and in the time of the proud, when there was no help.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach

Sahidic: ϯⲛⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ ⲛ̅ⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲛⲓⲙ ⲁⲩⲱ ϯⲛⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ϩⲛ̅ ⲟⲩⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϫⲉ ⲁⲕⲥⲱⲧⲙ̅ ⲉⲡⲁⲥⲟⲡⲥ̅.
English: I will praise thy name continually, and will sing praises with thanksgiving; and so my prayer was heard:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲁⲕⲧⲟⲩϫⲟⲉⲓ ⲅⲁⲣ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ϩⲙ̅ ⲡⲧⲁⲕⲟ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲁⲕⲛⲁϩⲙⲉⲧ ⲉⲩⲟⲩⲟⲉⲓϣ ⲙ̅ⲡⲟⲛⲏⲣⲟⲛ.
English: For thou savedst me from destruction, and deliveredst me from the evil time:

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲃⲉ ⲡⲁⲓ̈ ϯⲛⲁⲟⲩⲱⲛϩ̅ ⲛⲁⲕ ⲉⲃⲟⲗ ⲧⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲣⲟⲕ ⲁⲩⲱ ⲧⲁⲥⲙⲟⲩ ⲉⲡⲉⲕⲣⲁⲛ ⲡϫⲟⲉⲓⲥ.
English: therefore will I give thanks, and praise thee, and bless they name, O Lord.

book: Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
book-indexed: 07. Wisdom of Jesus son of Sirach
Sahidic: ⲉⲧⲓ ⲉⲓ̈ⲟ ⲛ̅ⲕⲟⲩⲓ̈ ⲉⲙⲡⲁϯⲕⲱⲧⲉ ⲁⲓ̈ϣⲓⲛⲉ ⲛ̅ⲥⲁ ⲧⲥⲟⲫⲓⲁ ϩⲁ ⲑⲏ ⲙ̅ⲡⲁϣⲗⲏⲗ.
English: When I was yet young, or ever I went abroad, I desired wisdom openly in my prayer.
